item.description:
June 22/ July 1
- 10 DAYS:
6 NIGHTS IN FLORENCE IN A HOTEL IN DUOMO SQUARE
2 NIGHTS IN VENICE IN A HOTEL IN ST. MARK SQUARE
- DAILY BREAKFAST
- VISIT OF FLORENCE with a PROFESSIONAL TOUR-GUIDE
- VISIT OF UFFIZI & ACCADEMY MUSEUMS
- TUSCAN COOKING CLASS IN FLORENCE
- 2 TUSCAN LUNCHES INCLUDING WINE
- 2 WINE TASTINGS
- VISIT OF SIENA & SAN GIMIGNANO
- WINE & CHEESE TASTING IN SAN GIMIGNANO
- 2 TUSCAN COUNTRYSIDE TOURS: CHIANTI, VERNACCIA
- VISIT WITH A TOUR ESCORT OF TUSCAN COUNTRYSIDE
- VISIT OF VENICE with a PROFESSIONAL TOUR-GUIDE
- VISIT OF MURANO ISLAND BY BOAT
- ART GLASS BLOW SHOW IN MURANO
- GONDOLA TOUR
- BELLINI'S COCKTAIL FAREWELL PARTY IN ELSA FAVORITE BAR
- PRIVATE TRANSPORTATION
- BILINGUAL TOUR MANAGER, MY SELF, ELSA GRAMOLA

For more details:
Elsa Gramola - A Taste of Italy in Austin
Italy Tours | Italian Language | Cooking Classes
www.ATasteOfItalyInAustin.com

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: TUSCAN WINE COUNTRYSIDE, FLORENCE, SIENA, SAN GIMIGNANO & VENICE
